skill.name: C# 1 - 2013-10-11 17:58:55
skill.description: Learn the fundamentals of programming using the wonderful C# programming language. Starting from the ground up, you will master the basics of procedural programming and the core of the C# language. You will learn about data types, arithmetic operations, input and output, conditional control structures, looping techniques, and more. By the end of this course you will be able to write simple programs to solve logic and math problems and interact with the user.
